models.insightCard: A proactive notification about financial status.
models.chatMessage: A message in the advisor chat history.

insights.title: Unusual Spending Detected
insights.message: Your spending in 'Entertainment' is $450 this month, which is 200% higher than your 6-month average ($150).

insights.title: Savings Goal On Track
insights.message: Based on your current savings rate, you are on track to hit your 'Home Down Payment' goal by November 2026.

insights.title: Subscription Optimization
insights.message: You have 3 separate streaming services totaling $45/mo. Switching to a yearly plan for Netflix could save you $20/year.

chatHistory.content: How much did I spend on coffee last month?

You spent **$240** on coffee in December. 

This is **15% lower** than November ($282). You're doing great at cutting back!
